actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the establishment of international criteria for endangered species of wildlife and the establishment of international humane standards.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of the Congress that the President, acting through the United States delegation to the United Nations, should take such steps as may be appropriate to urge the United Nations to initiate the establishment of international criteria for determining endangered species of wildlife; the establishment and maintenance of international lists of endangered species of wildlife; and the establishment of international standards for the humane treatment of animals.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the establishment of international criteria for endangered species of wildlife and the establishment of international humane standards.
